Title: Authorizes Yeshiva Bais Chaya Esther INC, in the city of New York, to file a retroactive application for exemption from water and sewer charges for certain assessment rolls
Summary: Authorizes Yeshiva Bais Chaya Esther INC, in the city of New York, to file a retroactive application for exemption from water and sewer charges for certain assessment rolls.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Yeshiva Bais Chaya Esther INC to file an application for exemption from water and sewer charges for certain assessment rolls
